page.title: 10CUSTOMS-MAYPOLE DANCING
page.content: Seven years ago our school celebrated its centenary and we decided to learn how to maypole dance. Each year since then the children from our school put on several displays for local fetes and galas and garden parties. There are many different ways of plaiting the ribbons to get various patterns.Our maypole has twelve ribbons, six blue and six red. We normally dance five dances:the Barber's Pole,the Spider's Web,the Single Plait,the Double Plait and Ropes.We have to practise quite alot so that we do'nt get the ribbons in a tangle! The girls wear white blouses, red skirts and red striped aprons, whilst the boys wear white shirts and blue shorts.We hope that lots more children will continue this old custom in Gotham because maypole dancing is fun.
